concept.definition: Gather/acquire information by an entity to achieve a stated purpose
Provide an entity access to information to achieve a stated purpose
Use of stored information by an entity fo the stated purpose
Release / transfer of information to an entity
Allowing an entity to correct a patient's information

description: This value set includes sample Consent Action codes.
name: Consent Action Codes

text.div:
Consent Action Codes

This value set includes sample Consent Action codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/consentaction defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
collect CollectGather/acquire information by an entity to achieve a stated purpose
access AccessProvide an entity access to information to achieve a stated purpose
use UseUse of stored information by an entity fo the stated purpose
disclose DiscloseRelease / transfer of information to an entity
correct Access and CorrectAllowing an entity to correct a patient's information
